de.esoco.gwt.client.ui

Class ValueListDataElementUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
      • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.ValueListDataElementUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler

    public class ValueListDataElementUI
extends DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
implements de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler
    A data element UI implementation for data elements that are constrained to a list of allowed values.

      • createInputUI

        protected de.esoco.ewt.component.Component createInputUI(de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerBuilder<?> rBuilder,
                                                         de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData rInputStyle,
                                                         de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement)
        Must be overridden by subclasses to modify the creation of the user interface components for the editing of the data element's value. The default implementation creates either a TextField with the value returned by DataElementUI.convertValueToString(DataElement, Object) or a list if the data element's value is constrained by a ListValidator. The list values will be read from the validator, converted with the above method, and finally expanded as resources. The creation of these components is handled by #createEditComponent(ContainerBuilder, StyleData, DataElement).
        Overrides:
        createInputUI in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
        Parameters:
        rBuilder - The container builder to create the components with
        rInputStyle - The default style data for the input components
        rDataElement - The data element to create the UI for
        Returns:
        The input user interface component or NULL if it shall not be handled by this instance

      • transferInputToDataElement

        protected void transferInputToDataElement(de.esoco.ewt.component.Component rComponent,
                                          de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement)
        Must be overridden by subclasses to modify the default transfer of input values from the user interface components to the data element. This method will only be invoked if this instance is in input mode and the data element is not immutable.

        The default implementation expects either a text field or a list as created by DataElementUI.createInputUI(ContainerBuilder, StyleData, DataElement). In the first case it invokes the DataElement.setStringValue(String) method with the field value. For a list the selected value will be read from the element's list validator.

        Overrides:
        transferInputToDataElement in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
        Parameters:
        rComponent - The component to read the input from
        rDataElement - The data element to set the value of

      • updateValue

        protected void updateValue()
        Updates the value of the element component if the data element value has changed.
        Overrides:
        updateValue in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>>
